html:
** Kornit Digital KRNT.O down 9.2% at $145.49 after Israeli textile printer maker launches equity offering

** Co late Tues announced 2.2 mln shares, including 705,701 shares to be sold by Amazon.com AMZN.O (Full Story)

** AMZN share sale relates to purchase agreement entered into five years ago that gave e-commerce firm warrants exercisable at $13.04. New agreement struck last year gave AMZN warrants to buy up to ~3.4 mln KRNT shares at $59.26

** KRNT plans to use net offering proceeds it receives for potential acquisitions, general corp purposes

** Co has ~46.3 mln shares outstanding, per Refinitiv data

** Citigroup, Goldman and Morgan Stanley bookrunners for offering targeted to price Thurs after market close

** Despite decline on the session, KRNT shares up ~63% YTD

** All 9 analysts covering KRNT recommend buying the stock and their median PT is $177.50, up from $147 on Aug 17 - Refinitiv


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)
